snippet.title: A Township Tale | Oculus Quest | E3 Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
A Township Tale is coming to Oculus Quest July 15th 2021!
Pre-Order the game on the Oculus Store!
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/2913958855307200/

This trailer was recorded on the PCVR version of A Township Tale, graphics and mechanics are not representative of the launch version on the Oculus Quest platform.

#ATownshipTale #vrgame #oculusquest #RPG #VR #Fantasy

►Quest Store: https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/2913958855307200/
►Discord: https://discord.gg/rNBVBSm
►Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/townshiptale/
►Twitter: https://twitter.com/townshiptale
►Website: https://townshiptale.com

---------------------------------------
A Township Tale is a multiplayer VR RPG medieval fantasy game, where players band together to form a society, explore dungeons and work in a town as blacksmiths, woodcutters, farmers and many more!

Join the Discord to start playing! A Township Tale currently runs on HTC Vive, and Oculus Rift. Any headsets that use OpenVR also work, and soon coming to Oculus Quest, July 15th 2021!

Visit https://townshiptale.com for more!
